short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HN Hiring Pro is a Chrome extension that filters and displays job postings on Hacker News' Who's Hiring threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HN Hiring Pro enhances your job search experience on Hacker News Hiring threads. It provides filtering, organization, and tracking capabilities to help you efficiently navigate through hundreds of job postings.

This is an Unofficial HN Extension and is not affiliated with YC. About me, https://jaingautam.com/

Listing the features of the extension below :

- 🔐 Privacy First: No Analytics or Tracking. All data saved to local storage.
- 🔍 Smart Filtering: Filter job posts by keywords like "remote", "onsite", "react" etc.
- 📝 Application Tracking: Mark posts as reviewed to distinguish them from the new one.
- 🎯 Keyword Highlighting: Instantly spot relevant terms in job descriptions.
- 🧹 Clean Interface: Hide reply threads to focus on job postings.
